title: How to Say Happy Birthday in Irish

steps.title: Be aware that it is possible to use one of two ways to say Happy Birthday to others.
steps.content: Be aware that it is possible to use one of two ways to say Happy Birthday to others. In Irish, you can use two different words for "birthday": [1] X Research source Lá breithe; or Breithlá.

steps.title: Learn how to say Happy Birthday using the two different methods:
steps.content: Learn how to say Happy Birthday using the two different methods: [2] X Research source Say "Lá breithe shona duit" - Happy birthday to you - Law breh-ha shun-ah ditch Say "Breithlá shona duit" - Happy birthday to you - Breh-law shun-ah ditch.

steps.title: Learn the Irish version of the Happy Birthday song.
steps.content: Learn the Irish version of the Happy Birthday song. Here's how the song goes: [3] X Research source Lá breithe shona duit, lá breithe shona duit, lá breithe shona [name], lá breithe shona duit. [4] X Research source

steps.title: Here's the pronunciation:
steps.content: Here's the pronunciation: [5] X Research source Law breh-ha hun-ah ditch - Lá breithe shona duit Law breh-ha hun-ah [name] - Lá breithe shona [name]

steps.title: Learn other relevant exclamations.
steps.content: Learn other relevant exclamations. For example: Hip-Hip Hooray! - Heip-heip abú! - Hep hep aboo.
